Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, fax, language tapes, newspapers, talking books, graphic novels and DVDs, exhibition space and meeting room available. Activities include Baby Time and children's activities, Councillor's surgery, homework club and games club. Provides 12 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office, internet access, a scanner and black and white printer, all available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Tues & Thurs closed, Wed & Fri 9am-12.30pm, 1.30-5pm, Sat 9am-12.30pm (opening times); Wed 3.30-4.30pm (Homework Zone, term-time only), Fri 10-11am (Baby Time, term-time only), 3rd Wed in the month 3.30-4.30pm (games club)
